name: Certain Domain+Directory
description:
Matches a certain
domain.tld/sub*
including anchors, get vars, http, https
content:
This RegEx finds "www.example.com/sub".

Examples:
should work using either http
http://www.example.com/foo
or https
https://www.example.com/foo

we should not ignore anchors
https://www.example.com/foo#anchor
or get variables
https://www.example.com/foo?get-vars

ignore further letters
http://www.example.com/foobar
or numbers
http://www.example.com/foo3ar
must have backslash or any other char than a-z or 0-9
http://www.example.com/foobar/kitten

but include deeper nested levels
http://www.example.com/foo/bar/index.html
of course also with anchors
http://www.example.com/foo/bar/index.html#anchor
or get variables
http://www.example.com/foo/bar/index.html?get-vars
not necessarily using "?"
http://www.example.com/foo/bar/index.html$get-vars
author: 5h4d0
